Description: To verify that channel user is able to initiate the "PPB" request for subscriber through USSD with all the mandatory fields.
To verify that channel user is unable to initiate the "PPB" request through USSD if all the mandatory fields are left blank.

To verify that following tag name is available while initiating "PPB" request through USSD and user is able to initiate successfully without entering value in it. Note the Fields ane leave fields as blank(PIN,LANGUAGE1,LANGUAGE2).
To verify that channel user is unable to initiate the "PPB" request if all the fields having more than the maximum limit of characters

To verify that channel user is unable to initiate the "PPB" request if the entered value in the PIN field is having invalid value(Pin value of other channel,other than numeric,more than character limit).
To verify that response is initiated successfully with all the mandatory fields(TYPE,TXNID and TXNSTATUS)and valid values.
To verify that TXNSTATUS field contain 200 value if "PPB" response is generated successfully else it display value other than 200
To verify that TXNSTATUS field contain "Fail" value if "PPB" response is not generated successfully.
To verify that success "PPB" response field contain all the  fields values in the character limit
To verify that channel user is unable to initiate the "PPB" request if MSISDN1/MSISDN2 field contain value of the deleted user.
To verify that channel user is unable to initiate the "PPB" request if entered value in the amount field is more than the channel user balance.
To verify that channel user is unable to initiate the "PPB" request if entered value in the Language1/Language2 field is other than numeric.
To verify that channel user is unable to initiate the "PPB" request if entered value in the "SELECTOR" field is other than numeric.
